concept.title: 4.1 Minimum Requirements

conbody.p: 4.1.15 All briefing charts presented to the SSA (including, but not limited to, competitive range briefing charts, pre-FPR request briefing charts, and decision briefing charts) must be included in the official (permanent) contract file.
4.1.16 Evaluation worksheets and summaries shall be included in the official (permanent) contract file.
